p: Estimates from model simulations that either capture the observed sensitivity or have been bias-corrected, result in similar estimates [ 36, 39, 42, 43]. Because of the robust relationship between sea-ice coverage and global-mean temperature, the time scale for establishing a given warming is irrelevant.
